name: part_000
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2025 ーYour True Colorsー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [etiR9Qnqlmc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental opening sequence with 'Your True Colors' birthday live graphics.
Story introduction sequence: 'Aki's Flower Shop' featuring stylized character art and narration.
Performance of the song 'Lower' (ロウワー).

subtitles.original: ここはとある世界のお花屋さん
subtitles.english: This is a flower shop in a certain world.

subtitles.original: そんな花屋には七色に輝く...
subtitles.english: In that flower shop, there was a single flower...

subtitles.original: ...一輪のお花がいました
subtitles.english: ...that shone with the colors of the rainbow.

subtitles.original: 彼女はこの花屋が大好きでした
subtitles.english: She loved this flower shop.

subtitles.original: 花屋では毎日たくさんの花たちが
subtitles.english: Every day at the flower shop,

subtitles.original: 美しく咲き誇ります
subtitles.english: many flowers bloom beautifully.

subtitles.original: そんなお花たちを見て
subtitles.english: The customers see those flowers...

subtitles.original: 笑顔になるお客さん
subtitles.english: ...and smile.

subtitles.original: 彼女はその笑顔が何よりも大好きでした
subtitles.english: She loved those smiles more than anything.

subtitles.original: でもここはお花屋さん
subtitles.english: But this is a flower shop.

subtitles.original: そんな咲き誇ったお花たちも一輪また一輪と
subtitles.english: Those blooming flowers, one by one,

subtitles.original: お客さんと一緒に旅立っていきました
subtitles.english: departed with the customers.

subtitles.original: 笑顔で旅立っていくお花とお客さんを見て
subtitles.english: Watching the flowers and customers depart with smiles,

subtitles.original: 彼女はとても幸せでした
subtitles.english: she was very happy.

subtitles.original: 「あれ、でも、だけど私は…？」
subtitles.english: "Oh, but, wait, what about me...?"

subtitles.original: 今日も笑顔で旅立っていくお花たち
subtitles.english: Today, too, the flowers depart with smiles.

subtitles.original: 「あのお花は大きくて綺麗だな、
subtitles.english: "That flower is big and beautiful,

subtitles.original: あの子の色は素敵だな、
subtitles.english: that one's color is lovely,

subtitles.original: あれ？私ってどんな花なんだろう…？」
subtitles.english: wait? What kind of flower am I...?"

subtitles.original: 自分の魅力がわからなくなってしまった彼女は
subtitles.english: Having lost sight of her own charm,

subtitles.original: ついに自分の色を見失ってしまいました
subtitles.english: she eventually lost sight of her own color.

subtitles.original: そう簡単な祈りだった
subtitles.english: It was such a simple prayer

subtitles.original: 綻びはだんだんとき消える感嘆
subtitles.english: The seams gradually fade, a sigh of admiration

subtitles.original: 今からドンドンが上がるから
subtitles.english: Since things will liven up from now on

subtitles.original: 静から会場を彩りさようなら
subtitles.english: Decorating the venue from the silence, goodbye

subtitles.original:
ロウワー
作詞・作曲：ぬゆり
subtitles.english:
Lower
Lyrics & Composition: nulut

subtitles.original:
見失う程の言の葉が
跪き出端をまた増えて繋ぎ
subtitles.english:
Words so numerous you lose sight of them
Kneeling down, they increase and connect again at the start

subtitles.original: 後ろめたさからくる
subtitles.english: Coming from a sense of guilt

subtitles.original:
浸りたい心とは裏腹に
旋律に込めて胸の中が
subtitles.english:
Contrary to the heart that wants to be immersed
The inside of the chest is filled with melody

subtitles.original: 降りない意味に寄る
subtitles.english: Depending on an unyielding meaning

subtitles.original:
受け止めたい言葉が
自分さえ変えられず
subtitles.english:
The words I want to accept
Can't even change me

subtitles.original: 持ち出したそれをまた退け
subtitles.english: Pushing away what was brought out again

subtitles.original: 霞んだ声は空回り
subtitles.english: The hazy voice spins its wheels

subtitles.original: 何を言うべきか分からなくて
subtitles.english: Not knowing what should be said

subtitles.original: 感じてたモノが遠く彼方へ消えた
subtitles.english: What I felt vanished into the far distance

subtitles.original: 同じようで違らなんて　ふつがう
subtitles.english: It's the same, yet different—how inconvenient

subtitles.original: いつまで行こうか　どこまで行けるのか
subtitles.english: How long shall we go? How far can we go?

subtitles.original: まだ始まっちゃいないんだよ　もっと
subtitles.english: It hasn't even started yet, more

subtitles.original: 僕らが離れるなら
subtitles.english: If we are to part

subtitles.original: 僕らが迷うなら
subtitles.english: If we are to lose our way

subtitles.original: その度に何回も繋がれる様に
subtitles.english: So that we can connect many times over

subtitles.original: ここにいてくれるなら
subtitles.english: If you will stay here

subtitles.original: 離さずにいられたら
subtitles.english: If I could keep from letting go

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない感覚に救われて
subtitles.english: Saved by a sensation that no one knows
